commitmsg: New favicon

Cleaning up The Den and Air

Removed embedded sharing from The Den; it gets that from the parent theme now.
Removed theme options from Air; it doesn't need it.

Added social sharing

Added missing header preview styles
Misc cleanup, detabbing
Added trackback message
Theme screenshots
Favicon

Minor style tweaks

Updated editor styles
Added more editor buttons
Press Center theme updates

Theme updates

* Sand has changed backgrounds and colors
* Open Sans used for body text
* Airmo and Den fixes for new grid
* Header preview has its own style sheet now, no longer embedded in functions.php
Use the canonical instance of Open Sans, now that it has the full character set.

Adding standard language packs

de-DE, es-ES, it-IT, fr-FR, pl-PL, and pt-BR
i18n improvements

Theme updates

- revised grid
- refactored CSS for easier reading
- improved i18n/l10n
- misc fixes and tweaks

Merge pull request #3 from debloper/upstream

Fix to cross-browser author-vcard-gradient & broken comment-box

[Bug 764532:partial] Fixes .vcard gradients in nonMoz browsers
Fixing bitgravity shortcode (accidental regression)
Fixed bitgravity shortcode, updated sidebar clock.
Fixed hierarchical categories in sidebar

Misc fixes and updates for The Den

* Featured posts in sidebar is now a widget
* l10n updates

Misc theme updates

- Added featured posts
- Added Den child theme
Added jwplayer on Pages, added Bitgravity shortcode

Updates/fixes

* Added Airmo child theme
* Fixes for Press Center
Moved masthead into its own include so child themes can override it.
updated screenshot
Adding Press Center child theme
Load comment-checker script from the parent theme.

Layered header image template

Transparent header images need to be exactly 340 x 240 (WordPress wrecks the alpha transparency when it crops/scaled).
Indent list items
Fixing paths

Bug fixes

* Use full URL for og:url on the home page (the home_url shortcut is null on the home page)
* Override image styles for inline smilies.
* Define options var on summary template so we can hide authors (missed that)
Style tweaks
Merge remote-tracking branch 'mozilla/master'
A few security fixes and other tweaks

Filter shortcodes in fc_meta_desc()

Set image sizes on theme activation, not theme setup

The after_setup_theme hook fires on every pageload, but we don't need to be writing all these options to the database that often. after_switch_theme only fires when the theme is activated. There are some other options we could move here as well but we'll start with the image sizes.

fix warnings/errors when WP_DEBUG is enabled

This is squashed commit of the following:

* fix array index issues in functions.php
* define $post in onemozilla_post_classes()
* quote 'color_scheme' in header.php
* add WordPress 3.4+ header image support (fixes #34)
* remove nonexistent $post_id from get_permalink()
* check if POST exists for featured post
* replace deprecated get_current_theme() with wp_get_theme()
* use isset() instead of array_key_exists() because it's faster
* update password form for WordPress >= 3.4
* bypass redirects and use the CDN

Fix functions.php

Oops.

Fix indentation

- Fix identation on array
- Remove unnecessary close tag of php

Update fr_FR.po

Added French strings for the file via Virtaal. I am not sure for the introduction of entities like " " so please tell me if these are not correct.

while still blocking direct hits.

Updating languages

And some other minor fixes

added the github link to the footer

Misc updates and new WebDev child theme

* Added honeypot spam catcher field
* Moved sharing and author hiding off theme options page
* New default featured thumbnail
* General tweaks and tidying
Fixes for editor styles, updated search field

Fix bug 856159 - comment count not displaying

Also moved social sharing to top of post for better visibility.

Removing WP language files

We don't need to maintain them in this repository.
Fix bug 840089 - remove padding for image masthead in narrow views
Fix bug 822811 - Facebook sharing dialog cut off
Bug 815233 - add Google Analytics
Some code tidying
